thread.title: Marcus
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Marcus

author: Marcus
title: Marcus
text: When I called in to Select Quote: I talked to Mando. He was very personable and really took the time to run me through the various insurance coverages for my new car that I had bought over the weekend. He was able to provide me better insurance and save me significant amount of money on my automotive insurance compared to the other Quote: s that I had received from other providers. He was great and I will call Select Quote: and ask for Mando every time!
